title: The Case Of The Missing Ward Skin.
body:
About 2 weeks ago i unlocked the gingerbread ward skin from a hex-tech chest. But now it has disappeared and when i try to switch to it in the pregame screen i cant find it there. I personally really like this ward skin and really want it back and i was wondering if anyone could send me in the right direction to achieving this. This would be much appreciated.

http://imgur.com/muecE9V
As seen in the image above, riven (me) has just placed the gingerbread ward while my friend who took the screenshot because his ward was sideways is walking beside me.


  {{item:3361}} {{item:3635}} {{champion:29}}

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and found that the Gingerbread Ward Skin shard was activated as a rental.  Activation consumes the shard and requires a confirmation, meaning that it's not possible to retrieve it after activation unfortunately.   Take heart, it's still possible to grab another shard through Hextech Crafting, or possibly through future sales/events.

I am sure that i activated it fully because it did use essence and if somehow i am delusional, is there a way that i can get it for keeps. i really liked how it waved back at me D: and the chances of getting it again are very slim.
